product_name: Yakima SkyBox Lo Carbonite Cargo Roof Box
long_description: Ideal for hauling gear for 3 campers, the low-profile Yakima SkyBox Lo Carbonite Cargo Roof Box features a dimple-textured lid that reduces drag, resulting in less noise and more stability.
short_description: Ideal for hauling gear for 3 campers, the low-profile Yakima SkyBox Lo Carbonite Cargo Roof Box features a dimple-textured lid that reduces drag, resulting in less noise and more stability.
